item.title: Ivolv :: Advantage Ivolv
item.description: Home - Advantage Ivolv Advantage Ivolv Ivolv is an essential provider of bespoke artificial intelligence solutions, for global B2B companies, through targeted, customized and insightful data intelligence. We enable clients unlock value through our services by helping manage technologies efficiently, streamline systems & processes to achieve optimum performances We employ experts in data science and analysis, subject matter experts, and technology professionals. Besides, we draw in the expertise of our cross-functional teams as needed based on the project requirements and together we are committed to helping our customer progress in a growing digital world.

item.title: Ivolv :: Advantage Ivolv

item.title: Ivolv :: Benefits
item.description: Home - Benefits of Data Transformations Benefits of Data Transformations In the current customer-driven marketplace, CxOs are faced with a number of challenges – gaining a 360 degree view of the customer, widening the customer outreach across ever-increasing channels and marketing campaigns, lengthening the customer life-cycle, strengthening brand image, expanding business operations, as well as proving an effective ROI. Enterprise-wide transformation is being driven by an aggressive adoption of intuitive data-driven digital technologies.

item.title: Ivolv :: Digital
item.description: Home - Be a Part of the Digital Revolution Be a Part of the Digital Revolution Businesses are experiencing a big change in their ecosystem caused by an unprecedented digital revolution. Where IT systems and customer-facing processes are seamlessly connected in real-time, a business can survive only to the extent that it is in sync with the external environment. Being sensitive to the evolving needs and perceptions of customers, understanding the changes occurring in technologies, improving and innovating product offerings, getting an early insight to the changes underway and knowing competition better; are increasingly becoming mandatory requirements.

item.title: Ivolv :: Empower
item.description: Home - Empower Your Journey from Data to Decisions Empower Your Journey from Data to Decisions Our data scientists at Ivolv Technologies are experts in data correlation and use of intramural frame-works. They work along with popular technologies to collect, cleanse, store, process and visualise data for timely decisions. Machine learning and predictive analytics are used to open up new opportunities in predictive data-driven decision making. The Internet of Things and hyper mobility adoption, is transforming the way businesses function.

item.title: Ivolv :: Home
item.description: This is a data-driven digital world where changes aren’t linear; but exponential. The only way to survive is to keep pace with innovation and tie data to business growth. Digital disruption is a great opportunity for business growth Make change happen, take advantage of the new opportunities that digital technology offers. In today’s digital world, data is a driving force behind major business decisions.

item.title: Ivolv :: Intelligence
item.description: Home - Automate Intelligence Automate Intelligence Businesses are undergoing a paradigm shift, as they realise the power of ‘data’. Data finds increased relevance in company policies and business decisions. It is paralleled as the “Renewed Energy” as it drives change in the way companies, market and influence customer behaviour. Like energy, data reaps huge rewards for companies who see its value and learn to extract and use it.

item.title: Ivolv :: Unleasing
item.description: Home - Unleashing the power of your data Unleashing the power of your data What’s the point in having vast data at your disposal if you cannot separate the chaff from the wheat? Investing in your data is pointless unless you sift through the data maze and transform data into insights. For as customers become smarter and more informed, the marketplaces also evolve and become highly competitive.
